Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We had an amazingly delicious breakfast here and also the coffee was really good especially the cappuccino. I would highly recommend it, if you want to fill your tummy with something yummy. üòä

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
We ordered
Thai Chicken Chili  with sesame bagel bread
Price - 6.75 ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
I was eating here with a buddy. The bagels were delicious, especially the cream cheese walnut honey!
I live in Berlin, but I'll be back next time! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good and tasty Bagels. Best in town.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good pricing, excellent service and perfect bagels. We had a wonderful time here and a great lunch. The restaurant is really cozy and comfortable. There are so many types of bagels and toppings. There‚Äôs no chance you cannot find a bagel you ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We ordered the wild salmon bagel with cream cheese, and the hummus bagel, and we were very happy with both. Service was nice and fast although the place was crowded.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Really nice bagels! They have a variety of options you can choose from, and all of them are pretty healthy. The staff was really nice as well.
I had an amazing iced green tea there, and my friend had a banana juice. They have an outside and inside sitting area. The only down side was wall the wasps around that area.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I just love this chain, every store I go they have the same excellent quality. Today I had a wild mushroom croquette bagel with a mochaccino and my wife had a mushroom-burger with a dark hot chocolate, everything it was great as always. The staff was also very friendly and the prices were good too.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good bagels, coffee nothing special at all. They could be a bit more attentive. Took them a while to get to us

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I visited 3 years ago and it is still as delicious now as it was then. Had the BLT and golden almond latte. Both delicious. Servers are nice and you can get your orders to go.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A great place for breakfast or take a break for long walk. The staffs are super friendly and the bagels taste heavenly. You won‚Äôt regret to stop by this lovely place.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Good food and drinks, friendly staff, nice vegan options

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Probably one of our favorite chains ever. It felt like a local baegelry in every shop we visited between The Hague and Amsterdam. The prices are very good (especially on a budget) and the quality is fresh and delicious. Definitely get the Tapas if you feel like sharing.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Second visit for bagels & beans. You would love this place! There's lots of options, but for me i really like the one with seaweed. And you can get freshly made tea here too. Good for breakfast or lunch

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing! The hazelnut latte was the best I've ever had ( so I had two) and the tuna melt bagel was soooooo good! If I lived in Amsterdam I'd go here all the time! The staff were really friendly and upbeat too.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Fantastic place! Awesome latte's and very friendly staff. Must go!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A really good bagel with an amazing view over the town. I tried the avocado bagel with sundried tomato cream cheese and it was absolutely amazing. My friend also tried the egg salad and salmon bagel and it was yummy as well. Highly recommended for a brunch in a sunny day

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
This place has lot of surprises.
SPOILER ALERT!
The chocolates on the table, some foods (I couldn't try those) on the menu, the ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We sat outside by the canal which was great. Good people watching if your into that. The food is mainly bagels and are all very tasty. No alcohol but the coffee is spot on. Our waiter was top shelf.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great Coffee and great food definitely a must for a quick bite to eat and a decent coffee. Nice and Cozey, plus full of the facilities you‚Äôd expect.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great atmosphere and great, friendly staff. They are so helpful and make you feel comfortable and relaxed just like home.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The food at B&B is really great and there are lots of choices, so everybody can find something they will love. This location is not so cool though, there's only one small window up front and the rest of the caf√© is tiny and a little ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: It is very good for breakfast. Delicious bagel and tea. There is large variety of bagels and tea opption.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Best bagels ever. The waitress was really friendly and polite. The view is extraordinary. Sweet animals walking around and on the tables. I think the most delicious bagels are the mushroom burger with tomato bagel and the avocado with sesame bagel + pesto & sundried tomatoes. Fits perfect with still or sprankling water.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Pretty great bagels, awesome location! Only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars was because I didn‚Äôt really have anything to compare it to...

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very nice service and a good selection for every kind of taste! Really nice and friendly service, good pricing, great bagels, great coffee and a nice tea selection! We will come back!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious bagels and juices! They have a great selection to choose from üòä also good for vegetarians and vegans!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Best bagel ever ,nice place , good service , and good price aswell üòçI‚Äôm in love with this place

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great location, very nice service and tasty bagels. They offer healthy, vegetarian & vegan options.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Had to wait 40 minutes to only get the menu but the food was good

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Friendly staff and good bagels. the cream cheese with pesto and sun dried tomato is amazing

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Not bad coffee, service friendly & fast.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Friendly and efficient service! The walnut and honey cream cheese is delicious!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Have a chai latte from the front of the shop, you can see out to the canal! It was delicious, and so is the smoked chicken bagel.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: A small place with a good coffee and great food...

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food and drink was lovely, staff were not. The girl who served us did not ask if we were ready to order rather she just stood next to us silently until we told her we weren't ready just yet. After getting our drinks we ordered a brownie too ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Not worth it the bad service, too crowded employees don't know who order what, takes really long time to clean the tables, desorganized

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love eating bagels here. The bagels are fresh they look good and taste fantastic. I suggest you also take the big coffee to really spoil yourself. Don‚Äôt go here during lunch if you wish to sit quietly but definitely worth going between 10-13 and 1430-1700

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Incredible breakfast, definitely get the mixed juice!!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I come here weekly, as it is very close to where I work. Can't praise quality if food and service enough. Staff is very kind, accommodating and they work really fast, even during rush times. I love the bagels and Niko makes the best cappucchinos in Amsterdam. You're doing a great job, Bagels and Beans Keizersgracht - thank you!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really great food and friendly staff. I would highly recommend visiting this place when in Amsterdam.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food was ok, not great. Too pricey for what was offered. The place was dirty inside, the kitchen as well.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice staff, fine bagels and warm atmosphere. A good place for a little break

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Friendly personnel but I would have appreciated if they cleaned the table a bit to get rid of the crumbs. It was crowded but it took very long to get the drinks and the nice bagels afterwards. The bagels were very tasty though.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food was delicious! Loved the chocolate melt and the tapas for two. The service was fine but nothing out of the ordinary. The only issue I had was that the washrooms were so gross! Puddles of water, no tissue paper, I didn't dare sit on the ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Cozy and delicious. Staff was very nice üòâ
Love the gluten free options (I'm a celiac)

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very yummy options but coming from the US I always feel like I'm paying a lot for a bagel. They always taste very good however and offer a comfy atmosphere to have breakfast/brunch. Also one of the few places to get a bagel in Amsterdam

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: So fresh! Bread is very nice.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Everything was super delicious! The pecan pie was fudgy vegan goodness, the large coffee was HUGE, and both of the bagels we tried were so satisfying. Our server was also really welcoming and kind. Perfect quick breakfast spot and great for dorky tourists like me.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: My husband is a Celiac and was able to eat pretty much everything. The gluten free Bagels were really tasty, you wouldn't have known it was gluten free. Would definitely go again and I would definitely recommend. Great selection for those who have dietary requirements and a great selection for those that can eat everything.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great food but apparently tap water is a one time thing.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love Bagels & Beans so much! My go to in Amsterdam for delicious and tasty breakfast/lunch. They have gluten free bagels that taste so good! And you can also buy gluten free bagels that are frozen, to bring back home with you. Taste just as good when you make them at home!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent bagels, crunchy on the outside but still fluffy on the inside. The mango and orange juice were both fresh and delicious, and the matcha latte and hot chocolate were also both very good. We came not long after they opened so the place was empty, but it is quite small and could potentially fill up.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Lovely location. Friendly staff.  Great vegan options and the food is excellent.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cute place, great service, fair coffee fair prices. Liked the old menu better

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I love this place! The staff is super nice, and the menu offers a lot of delicious options! The ambiance is chill and cozy, and the bagels are obviously great üòç If you pass by any Bagels and Beans feeling hungry, you should definitely try it!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Writing this for my daughter: We ordered hot chocolate which is very presented with hot milk in a glass mug and chocolate chips on ther side in a small ramekin. The only problem was there was cream cheese in the bottom of the ramekin.  So ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Best gluten free bagels and lox

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Love it! Bagels & Beans is one of those cafe's you HAVE To try out! Great staff, delicious coffee, super-yummy bagels, all made by request, on demand and fresh! Cannot wait to be back!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Good food

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Our friends recommended us this place when we came to visit for the weekend. Honestly blown away by the service, location and food! ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I like bagels, just not this location. Slow service, rude employees, and meddling people around. It is literally a place to stay out of. Everything is frozen and then reheated. And then imagine getting threatened for giving bad review. Haha sure sue me. Also mind that the owners will pop out of nowhere and give you an awkward time.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Really nice bagels, good coffee and pleasant atmosphere. I had the breakfast that included a bagle, jam, cream cheese, ham, cheese, a croissant thing, coffee and juice, for 11 euro. Most importantly, it was really nice.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great place for coffee and a light lunch. Excellent variety of bagels and vegetarian/vegan sandwiches. Outdoor seating area offers a great view of the canal and their just a 5 minutes walk to the museum quartet and I am Amsterdam sign

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great breakfast warm service

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Nice bagels still a bit fluffy on the inside, maybe toasted a bit too much. Bagels, coffee and orange juice were all nice and the staff is friendly. Unfortunately the place is quite cramped with little space between tables.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
Really good bagels! I had my first bug bagel ever and bugs are so tasty!
Super nice staff too üôÇ

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Food portion was adequate. Freshly squeezed juice was fantastic as expected a carton quality. prices are decent and the atmosphere is friendly although the staff don't fuss over you or go the extra mile but if you just want hassle free ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagles and beverage are always good, I love it

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels and Beans is my favorite place to go. They offer vegan and vegetarian options which are delicious. They offee vegan drinks too. Its small and cosy and I love their specials. This time around iced matcha latte (standard served with ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: This cafe is super small so you might have to wait for a table (our wait was approximately 10 minutes). But it‚Äôs worth it! The bagels were yummy, and the drinks were interesting and well priced.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: You can choose 6 different kind of dough and the bagels were tasty. A bit pricy honestly..more then 6 EUR for a filled bagel! I'd suggest to try tho.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Bagels and Beans appears to be a chain of bagel cafes around Amsterdam. On a 3 day weekend in Amsterdam, various Bagels and Beans cafes became our regular brunch go to. They offer delicious, good value filled bagels which set you up well ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Just love these places for breakfast! Please can we get this here on the UK üá¨üáß next door to where I live please üòä... They really set you up with lots of goodness for the day and no need for expensive juicing lol üòÇ... Seriously if you get the chance check out any Bagels and Beans in Amsterdam do it!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Tight squeeze there but the coffee was great.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: We visited Bagel and Beans on a flying visit to Amsterdam. It was quite busy, and we were lucky to get a table next to the canal. Being busy, the service was a little slow, but I can forgive this for the quality of the food served, which ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I love Bagels & Beans, however, this venue was very disappointing. Compared to any other B&B in Amsterdam, even if it‚Äôs the same menu, the amount was amazingly different. Especially, the tiny 2 pieces of salmon made me shocked.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Awesome bagels with some adventurous options if you want to try dried insects on a bagel! Knocked a star as this place is always slammed and you may have to wait or come back later as they have limited seating

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent breakfast. We had smoked salmon two ways and it was delicious the coffee was so lovely and strong. Definitely recommend here for any light meal.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious food and great service. The prices are very affordable for Amsterdam. If you're looking for a lighter and more affordable breakfast this is definitely the place to visit :>

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Amazing bagels and the fresh ice tea is a must have! Don't go there if you are in a hurry during lunch, the place is small and the staff not enough. Still, worth the wait

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Delicious, perfect view of the canal. Must try the lemon & ginger tea.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: It's a nice cosy place for good food. It's gotten a bit pricey over the years and service is always slow...but a nice cafe to get a (quick?) biteüëç

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
I stumbled upon this place while going somewhere else, and I'm only rating it because of the waitress who served me. She had a truly magical smile, and was very kind.
The food is nice.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The bagels are very good and tasty,but the service is awful,I was standing at the counter and of 4 people working,1 was eating,1 walking around and other 2 playing with each other,nobody cares about me waiting there to order...after that more than 10 mins for a bagel to take away...

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: The shop is messy. Ruble laying around, little bowls with sugar cubes standing on the tables probably all day, so not very hygienic. And worse, staff doesn't pay attention to their guests here. I even walked up to their counter to ‚Ä¶

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Very cosy but the bagels and variety on offer was excellent.  They take pride in sustainability and organic produce.  They even sell bugs and insects to eat.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great place for all the day breakfast and brunch. Different bagels with lots of topics and impressive selection of freshly squeezed juices and smoothies. Quite busy though

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Relaxed service, nice way to spend an hour or two just enjoying the surroundings by the canal. Great selection of bagels and great coffee. Always stop here when we're in town.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Would like a low sugar option on a cakes or cookies.  Fancied a treat one very busy day. Couldn't offer me anything, other than apple pie, which I am not a fan.  So just had a cup of tea.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
It's only small but very very popular.
Expect to cue at peak times.
Food is fantastic.  Even serve the full English.  The eggs benedict or florentine are great too. So are the breads and various drinks.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Great food and very kind staff, the only problem was the service witch was super slow. We waited 30 minutes untill we got the menu...

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: always happy in any of the cafes of this small Holland food "chain". Any Bagel is worth it, you can't go wrong here. Also good selection of tees.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Excellent breakfast menu, loved the porridge and extras on top. Great coffee. Busy, friendly staff. Rest of the menu looked brilliant.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Cozy and yummy! Make sure you order the salmon bagel or the gluten-free bagel. They're both great!

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I didn't eat anything but I got a bottle of coconut water and a chai latte all that probably would have preferred an actual Masala chai. but the most amazing thing was their iced coffee with cream , it really blew my mind. Free Wi-Fi and a bathroom down the most narrow stairs you ever saw.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text:
I had a bagel with banana, peanut butter and cinnamon. Absolutely delicious.
Very kind the girls that made it right before closing.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: I would love Brighton to catch on to this concept: really nice bagels, drinks, and no frills. So nice that I've been two times on this trip.

Name: Bagels & Beans
Review Text: Rude staff. Spent 20 euros on food. Not allowed a small glass of tap water with our meal?? Were made to feel like an inconvenience for eating here. Won‚Äôt be returning.

Name: Bagels & Beans
